name: On Thin Ice (IanGoGo)
description:
Made for the Trijam #171 - Watch your step

After finding herself on the wrong side of the local crime family, Luna is given one last chance to prove her innocence by surviving a walk down a frozen river.

Controls (Can be rebound)

  • Up key - move up
  • Down key - move down
  • Esc - Full screen 

This game is Cannon to the Project 2021 story. Play the rest of the games here: https://itch.io/c/2063306/12-games-12-months-1-story

Credits

  • Music - Dark Fantasy Studio "In the shadows" 
  • Everything else - IanGoGo
